definition: simplified form of Chinese characters, as opposed to traditional form 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3]
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
simplified Chinese character, as opposed to traditional Chinese character 繁體字|繁体字[fan2 ti3 zi4]

sentences.english: Tom Riddle would kill Lord Voldemort, and it would be the last thing he did.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆謎語將殺死繁簡體轉換，而這是最後的事情來做。

sentences.english: I just want to live while I am alive.
sentences.chinese: 你還是打簡體中文我們看着方便一點跌死。

sentences.english: Did you study standard or simplified Characters?
sentences.chinese: 所學是正體字或簡體字？

sentences.english: A summation of the kinds of differences found between traditional characters and their simplified versions.
sentences.chinese: 爲繁體字和簡體字之間的諸多不同之處作一綜述。

sentences.english: We should have a mastery of the advantages and disadvantages of both complex Chinese characters and simplified Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 漢字繁體字和簡體字，從不同的角度看，各有優缺點。

sentences.english: And they pride themselves in not using the simplified version.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲自己沒有使用簡體字而感到自豪。

sentences.english: Tsinghua University Press entitled The Simplified Chinese version of the CD exclusive copyright.
sentences.chinese: 清華大學出版社享有該光盤的中文簡體版專有出版權。

sentences.english: This book contains 10 chapters in Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本書含十章，包括繁體中文和簡體中文版。

sentences.english: In our sample, we take Simplified Chinese and English as an example.
sentences.chinese: 這裏以簡體中文和英語爲例。

sentences.english: Support for Simplified Chinese in China is scheduled to follow shortly after initial beta release.
sentences.chinese: 面向中國的簡體中文版計劃在發佈試用版之後發佈。

sentences.english: Idiom's language supports both Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 成語的版本亦同時支援繁體中文和簡體中文。

sentences.english: Simplified Chinese characters from Oracle to the evolutionary history of a continuous and verifiable.
sentences.chinese: 簡體字來自於連續可證明的甲骨文的進化史。

sentences.english: This book contains 9 books in Traditional and Simplified Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本書含《四書五經》，包括繁體中文和簡體中文版。

sentences.english: For example, suppose you want to support Simplified Chinese in an application.
sentences.chinese: 例如，假設您想在應用程序中支持簡體中文。

sentences.english: The following is our sample Web site in Simplified Chinese and English respectively.
sentences.chinese: 下面是該站點的簡體中文版和英文版。

sentences.english: The site also began displaying search results in the simplified Chinese characters that are used in mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 站點也開始以中國大陸使用的簡體中文顯示搜索結果。

definition: simplified Chinese character, as opposed to traditional Chinese character 繁體字|繁体字[fan2 ti3 zi4]
standard form of a Chinese character/(Tw) traditional (i.e. unsimplified) characters
traditional form of Chinese, as opposed to simplified form 簡體|简体[jian3 ti3]
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
to err/to dial a wrong number/to make a typo
